name: Jumping Knight - DEMO
description:
• "THIS IS DEMO FOR FULL VERSION VISIT STEAM PAGE"
  • https://store.steampowered.com/app/1463870/Jumping_Knight/

Jumping Knight is a platformer game with an atmospheric-dark world and a lot of challenging levels.

The story is simple, the main character is a tiny knight who lost his princess, who was kidnapped by a strange monster. Your main task is to find her and protect her from this monster.

Within gameplay you will face a lot of different barriers, all of them are unique and you need to think about how to avoid them, use your skill and timing to choose the correct time to pass all levels.
